acupoint.standard_location: 在臀部外侧，侧卧屈髋，在股骨大转子最凸点与骶管裂孔连线的外侧1/3与内侧2/3交点上
acupoint.standard_location_en: At the junction of the lateral 1/3 and medial 2/3 of the line connecting the prominence of the greater trochanter and the sacral hiatus, with patient in lateral recumbent position with thigh flexed
acupoint.simple_method: 侧卧屈腿，以拇指关节横纹按在股骨大转子上，拇指指向脊柱，拇指尖所指的凹陷处即是本穴
acupoint.simple_method_en: Lie on side with knee bent. Place thumb knuckle on greater trochanter, point thumb toward spine. The depression at thumb tip is the point.
acupoint.anatomical: 臀大肌深层，坐骨神经和股方肌；有臀下动静脉，深层有坐骨神经
indications: 腰腿痹痛 (low back and leg pain)
functions: 强健腰膝 (strengthen lumbar and knees)
活血止痛 (promote blood circulation, relieve pain)
